issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Hi. I am having the following problem, and I would like you to help me solve it:
I have a SearchBar associated with a ListView. When I execute a search and no results are found, the "noresults" event of the ListView is called twice.
Thank you
fields.summary: ListView no results event is called twice
fields.environment:
Osx Mojave
Titanium 8.3.0 SDK
iOS emulator

comments.body: Hi! Thanks for reporting the problem. Could you share your code that reproduces the issue? Preferably as minimal as possible, the best case would be a single-file classic example.
